title: Visa Inc | Software Engineer
content:
Education: B.Tech in ECE from a Tier 3 college

Prior Experience: Developer at a service-based company
Current Compensation: 8.45 LPA
Years of Experience: 2 years 7 months

Date of Offer: January 2025
Company: Visa Inc
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: ₹15,00,000
Relocation, Joining Bonus & Stocks: Not applicable
Variable Pay / Performance Bonus: ₹1,50,000
PF (Company Contribution): ₹90,000
Gratuity: ₹36,000
Total Compensation: ₹17,76,000
Benefits: Standard Visa benefits

I applied for the position in October 2024 through LinkedIn and received an assessment link the very next day. After about a month, I was invited for an interview. The selection process consisted of two rounds: a technical interview and a hiring manager round. After another month of waiting, I finally received a call from HR confirming my selection.

PS: This is my first offer while switching jobs, so I didn’t have anything to leverage. The HR team remained firm on the base salary without any flexibility for an increase.
